issue.title: [CF 751] Icons not showing stacks
issue.body:
I cant track how many stacks from "Destabilize" (Amber shaper) and "Scary Fog" (Lei Shi) my target have.

^1^T^SShowTimer^B ^SBuffOrDebuff^SEITHER ^SUnit^Starget ^SType^Sbuff ^SShowTimerText^B ^SName^SDestabilize;~`Scary~`Fog ^SShowTTText^B ^SSettingsPerView^T ^Sicon^T ^STextLayout^S,I2.#>K/c8-s ^STexts^T ^N1^S ^N2^S[Stacks] ^t^t^t^SEnabled^B ^t^N61103^S~`~| ^Sicon^^

I tried to change the text display to "[Stacks:Hide(0)]" and didnt work too.

What do you expect to happen? What happens instead?

Icons show buff/debuff stacks

What version of TellMeWhen are you using?  6.11.

Do you have an error log of what happened? No.


> Posted by CurseForge user Senxs | Imported from CurseForge issue #751 | Raw

comments.body:
Disable the Show Variable Text option for the icon.

Edited Jan 28, 2013

> Posted by CurseForge user lsjyzjl
